title: Galaxy Watch 5 adds FDA-approved AFib monitoring and narrows Apple Watch gap
description: Irregular Heart Rhythm Notification will tell you if the smartwatch detects signs of atrial fibrillation.

title: Sony’s new portable Bluetooth speaker is ready to get wet
description: Sony’s new Bluetooth speaker is waterproof and has extended battery life, but the best thing about it may be its price.

title: Asus ROG Ally European pricing may have leaked and it's not good news
description: A new rumor suggests that the European price for the Asus ROG Ally's high-end model will be €799, which is far steeper than a Steam Deck.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy 3 review roundup: Marvel’s best trilogy ends on a high note
description: James Gunn’s trilogy of Guardians movies is a critical hat-trick, with Guardians of the Galaxy 3 releasing to warm reviews.

title: Elon Musk launches what may be his largest Twitter purge yet
description: Elon Musk announces an inactive Twitter account purge.

title: This dangerous new Android malware can steal your passwords and 2FA codes
description: Multiple apps are distributing an infostealer that targets victims in Eastern Asia.

title: Sony invites you to hook up a mic and sing with its big new Bluetooth speaker
description: Sony's SRS XB800 can modify sound depending on orientation, has its own wheels and sports an optical-in to boost your TV's audio.

title: New Oppenheimer trailer gives first extended look at Christopher Nolan’s WWII epic
description: The Oppenheimer movie has got a new trailer, showing off Christopher Nolan’s upcoming WWII epic and nuclear bomb biopic with aplomb.

title: The MSI data breach might have leaked some very important Intel code
description: MSI ransomware attack also leaked Intel BootGuard private keys, which could have catastrophic consequences.

title: Chrome OS is getting one of your favorite Android features
description: Dynamic themes, a popular Android feature, will finally be hitting Chrome OS but only if you activate it in Dev version 114 as of now.

title:
Western Digital says it's finally ready to 
finish restoring all your online services
description: Following a data breach earlier this year, Western Digital is finally bringing the last of its services back online.

title: Your Gmail account is set to be invaded by even more annoying ads
description: When Google said it was rolling out a new Gmail interface, we didn’t realize it would be filled with ads.

title: Microsoft could cram more ads into Windows 11 – this time in the Settings app
description: Digging in a fresh preview build has uncovered yet more prompting to sign up for a Microsoft Account.

title: Here's our best look yet at the design of the iPhone 15 Ultra
description: We've got a detailed iPhone 15 Ultra mockup model to look at, which backs up many of the rumors we've already heard.

title: Verified Facebook accounts are being hacked to spread malware - here's how you can stay safe
description: Hackers are stealing verified Facebook accounts and using them to run malicious ad campaigns.

title: The latest Pixel Tablet leak reveals specs, pricing, and an on-sale date
description: We may get an official launch for the Pixel Tablet this week, but in the meantime here are some unofficial details.

title: Google Pixel 7a – these are the 7 biggest rumors so far
description: The Pixel 7a may well appear at Google IO 2023 this week, and extensive leaks have given us a good idea of what it will be like.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, May 8 (game #469)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
